item.title: YouTube Onscreen Talent - Upwork
item.description:
Hi there,

We're looking for an onscreen talent to introduce clips on our YouTube channel focused on 'Karen' encounters.

Job Details:

Role: Introduce each clip (scripts are 450-600 words).
Commitment: Daily videos, recorded within 24 hours.
Video Length: 15-30 minutes; you'll appear for about 2 minutes per video.
Long-term Opportunity: Seeking someone reliable for ongoing work.

Requirements:

American/Canadian
Confident presentation skills.
Ability to deliver engaging intros.
Available for quick turnarounds.
Interested? Please reply with your rates and any relevant experience.

Thanks!

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 16, 2024 05:09 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:YouTube, Video Production, Video Editing
Skills: YouTube, Video Production, Video Editing
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: French-speaking Social Media Video Designer for Instagram Reels - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a skilled video designer to create beautiful reels for Instagram.

Native French speaking only.

As an expert in social media design, you will be responsible for producing engaging and eye-catching videos for our projects and clients.
The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of Instagram's reel format and the ability to create visually appealing videos that capture attention. This role requires creativity, attention to detail, and the ability to work with tight deadlines. If you are passionate about creating stunning videos for social media platforms and have experience in designing Instagram reels, we would love to hear from you!

Hourly Range: $11.00-$17.00
Posted On: June 16, 2024 04:24 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Instagram, Graphic Design, Social Media Marketing, Video Editing
Skills: Instagram, Graphic Design, Social Media Marketing, Video Editing
Country: France
click to apply

item.title: Product Demo and Launch Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Our start-up is launching its B2C product, and we are looking for a talented freelance video editor to create an engaging product launch video. The video will showcase the value of the product, highlight its features, and MAYBE include a short demo of how the platform works (need you to be creative on this one). This video will be key in attracting new users and explaining the benefits of the product in a concise, compelling, and engaging way.

Responsibilities:

- Collaborate with the team to understand the product, target audience, and key messaging.

- Source and edit video footage, graphics, and animations to create a professional and engaging video.

- Create an engaging script for the video.

- Incorporate product screenshots and demo footage to demonstrate how the product works.

- Add background music, voiceovers, and sound effects to enhance the video.

- Ensure the video aligns with the product's brand guidelines and tone.

- Deliver the final video in various formats suitable for web and social media use.

I want to launch this video publicly on June 25th.

Budget: $200
Posted On: June 16, 2024 04:22 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Demo Video, Promotional Video, Video Editing, Video Production, Video Commercial, Product Launch
Skills: Demo Video, Promotional Video, Video Editing, Video Production, Video Commercial, Product Launch
Country: Canada
click to apply
